definitions.definition: The rotation of an aircraft , ship , or missile about its vertical axis so as to cause the longitudinal axis of the aircraft, ship, or missile to deviate from the flight line or heading in its horizontal plane .
The angle between the longitudinal axis of a projectile at any moment and the tangent to the trajectory in the corresponding point of flight of the projectile .
( nautical ) A vessel 's motion rotating about the vertical axis, so the bow yaws from side to side; a characteristic of unsteadiness .
The extent of yawing ; the rotation angle about the vertical axis.

main_definition: The rotation of an aircraft , ship , or missile about its vertical axis so as to cause the longitudinal axis of the aircraft, ship, or missile to deviate from the flight line or heading in its horizontal plane .
secondary_definitions: The angle between the longitudinal axis of a projectile at any moment and the tangent to the trajectory in the corresponding point of flight of the projectile .
( nautical ) A vessel 's motion rotating about the vertical axis, so the bow yaws from side to side; a characteristic of unsteadiness .
The extent of yawing ; the rotation angle about the vertical axis.

definitions.definition: A single tumor in the disease called yaws .

main_definition: A single tumor in the disease called yaws .
